channel.title: Subvision-Sound [SVS] Promotion
channel.description:
[CENTER]| ▂ ▃ ▆ ▅ ▆ ▃ ▂ | SUBVISON-SOUND [SVS] | ▂ ▃ ▆ ▅ ▆ ▃ ▂ |[/CENTER] [CENTER]What is Subvision-Sound? I would like to welcome you all. Our channel is only a new promotional channel, but I will be explaining to you what Subvision-Sound channel is all about. Our youtube channel is about giving chance to NEW music producers to get there songs/music they create out to the world. It's about giving people hope to become what they want to be, But our channel or no other producer can grow without the people. By helping us out we can help others. We are about promoting the MUSIC giving you only the BEST MUSIC out today. We not only promote new music from the artists, but you aswell can request to us a track that you think DESERVES more fame over the internet. So we are saying this:
- Sumbit your track - Request a track to us - Submit a track
Music Genres? [COLOR="Silver"]Our channel uploads a variety of different genres in the world today, Most genres That most people do listen to nowdays and is used on T.V, even games, Genres such as: [CENTER] [ul][*]Dubstep [*]Techno [*]House Music [*]Drum N Base [*]Dubfusion [*]Trance Music [*]And other genres [/CENTER] [If you would like to look at more of what we do, Please visit our youtube channel and you will find all information there, If not give us a inbox and will answer your questions.][/CENTER] [CENTER]Where can you find us?[/CENTER] [CENTER]You can find us in 3 different places on the internet at the moment, We have a youtube channel of course, We have a soundcloud and we have a facebook. Just give us a message if you have any trouble understanding what we are all about.[/CENTER] [CENTER]Youtube: [url=https://www.youtube.com/user/SubvisionSound]https://www.youtube.com/user/SubvisionSound[/url] Facebook: [url=http://www.facebook.com/pages/Subvision-Sound/473699666016128?skip_nax_wizard=true#]Subvision Sound | Facebook[/url] Soundcloud: [url=https://soundcloud.com/subvision-sound]https://soundcloud.com/subvision-sound[/url]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/nlebmd.png[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER]As you know already out channel has just started, So don't except much at the moment. This thread is still under-construction aswell.
EDIT: WE ARE STILL FIXING LITTLE THINGS ON THE CHANNEL ASWELL, SUCH AS THE YOUTUBE VIDEO BACKGROUNDS ETC, IF ANYONE HAS ANY TRACKS THEY WOULD LIKE TO SUBMIT, INBOX VIA HERE OR MOPARSCAPE OR JUST LEAVE A COMMENT ON HERE.[/CENTER][/ul]

item.title: Subvision-Sound [SVS] Promotion
item.dc:creator: @Elemental_God Elemental God
item.description:
@Elemental_God wrote:

[CENTER]| ▂ ▃ ▆ ▅ ▆ ▃ ▂ | SUBVISON-SOUND [SVS] | ▂ ▃ ▆ ▅ ▆ ▃ ▂ |[/CENTER]
[CENTER]What is Subvision-Sound?
I would like to welcome you all. Our channel is only a new promotional channel, but I will be explaining to you what Subvision-Sound channel is all about. Our youtube channel is about giving chance to NEW music producers to get there songs/music they create out to the world. It’s about giving people hope to become what they want to be, But our channel or no other producer can grow without the people. By helping us out we can help others. We are about promoting the MUSIC giving you only the BEST MUSIC out today.
We not only promote new music from the artists, but you aswell can request to us a track that you think DESERVES more fame over the internet.
So we are saying this:

  • Sumbit your track
  • Request a track to us
  • Submit a track

Music Genres?
[COLOR=“Silver”]Our channel uploads a variety of different genres in the world today, Most genres That most people do listen to nowdays and is used on T.V, even games, Genres such as:
[CENTER]
[ul][]Dubstep
[]Techno
[]House Music
[]Drum N Base
[]Dubfusion
[]Trance Music
[*]And other genres
[/CENTER]
[If you would like to look at more of what we do, Please visit our youtube channel and you will find all information there, If not give us a inbox and will answer your questions.][/CENTER]
[CENTER]Where can you find us?[/CENTER]
[CENTER]You can find us in 3 different places on the internet at the moment, We have a youtube channel of course, We have a soundcloud and we have a facebook. Just give us a message if you have any trouble understanding what we are all about.[/CENTER]
[CENTER]Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/SubvisionSound
Facebook: Subvision Sound | Facebook
Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/subvision-sound

nlebmd.png800×600
[/CENTER]

[CENTER]As you know already out channel has just started, So don’t except much at the moment. This thread is still under-construction aswell.

EDIT: WE ARE STILL FIXING LITTLE THINGS ON THE CHANNEL ASWELL, SUCH AS THE YOUTUBE VIDEO BACKGROUNDS ETC, IF ANYONE HAS ANY TRACKS THEY WOULD LIKE TO SUBMIT, INBOX VIA HERE OR MOPARSCAPE OR JUST LEAVE A COMMENT ON HERE.[/CENTER][/ul]

Read full topic
